Xavier Noria wrote:

> In general I would like to have a REST pattern for sending a *subset*  
> of attributes to be updated if that fits the REST paradigm, or else to  
> be certain it doesn't.
> 

Yes, I'm currently trying to decide how to distinguish between

<foo>
   <bar>23</bar
   <baz>17</baz>
</foo>

and

<foo>
   <bar>23</bar
</foo>

In particular does the latter eliminate baz, or simply ignore it? And 
what if I need to do both in my app? In my case, the empty string is not 
the same as null. perhaps I need something like

<foo>
   <bar>23</bar
   <baz xsi:nil='true'/>
</foo>

I'm not sure. Suggestions are appreciated.
